subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Fans love to watch Nascar’s Nextel Cup stars racing for fun on Saturdays and dominating the Busch Series. But Busch drivers and teams are growing more and more frustrated by the constant drubbings.
snippet: Fans love to watch Nascar’s Nextel Cup stars racing for fun on Saturdays and dominating the Busch Series. But Busch drivers and teams are growing more and more frustrated by the constant drubbings.
